verses.verse: Woe <S%H1945><s%> to the bloody <S%H1818><s%> city, <S%H5892><s%> completely <S%H3605><s%> full <S%H4392><s%> of lies <S%H3585><s%> [and] pillage; <S%H6563><s%> [Her] prey <S%H2964><s%> never <S%H3808><s%> departs. <S%H4185><s%>

The noise <S%H6963><s%> of the whip, <S%H7752><s%> The noise <S%H6963><s%> of the rattling <S%H7494><s%> of the wheel, <S%H212><s%> Galloping <S%H1725><s%> horses, <S%H5483><s%> And bounding <S%H7540><s%> chariots! <S%H4818><s%>

Horsemen <S%H6571><s%> charging, <S%H5927><s%> Swords <S%H2719><s%> flashing, <S%H3851><s%> spears <S%H2595><s%> gleaming, <S%H1300><s%> Many <S%H7230><s%> slain, <S%H2491><s%> a mass <S%H3514><s%> of corpses, <S%H6297><s%> And countless <S%H369><s%> <S%H9523><s%> dead <S%H1472><s%> bodies <S%H1472><s%> – They stumble <S%H3782><s%> over the dead <S%H1472><s%> bodies! <S%H1472><s%>

[All] because <S%H4480><s%> of the many <S%H7230><s%> harlotries <S%H2183><s%> of the harlot, <S%H2181><s%> The charming <S%H2580><s%> <S%H2896><s%> one, <S%H2896><s%> the mistress <S%H1172><s%> of sorceries, <S%H3785><s%> Who sells <S%H4376><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> by her harlotries <S%H2183><s%> And families <S%H4940><s%> by her sorceries. <S%H3785><s%>

"Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I am against <S%H413><s%> you," declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts; <S%H6635><s%> "And I will lift <S%H1540><s%> up your skirts <S%H7757><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> your face, <S%H6440><s%> And show <S%H7200><s%> to the nations <S%H1471><s%> your nakedness <S%H4626><s%> And to the kingdoms <S%H4467><s%> your disgrace. <S%H7036><s%>
"I will throw <S%H7993><s%> filth <S%H8251><s%> on you And make <S%H9310><s%> you vile, <S%H9310><s%> And set <S%H7760><s%> you up as a spectacle. <S%H7210><s%>

"And it will come <S%H1961><s%> about that all <S%H3605><s%> who see <S%H7200><s%> you Will shrink <S%H5074><s%> from you and say, <S%H559><s%> 'Nineveh <S%H5210><s%> is devastated! <S%H7703><s%> Who <S%H4310><s%> will grieve <S%H5110><s%> for her?' Where <S%H370><s%> will I seek <S%H1245><s%> comforters <S%H5162><s%> for you?"

Are you better <S%H3190><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> No-amon, Which was situated <S%H3427><s%> by the waters <S%H4325><s%> of the Nile, <S%H2975><s%> With water <S%H4325><s%> surrounding <S%H5439><s%> her, Whose <S%H834><s%> rampart <S%H2426><s%> [was] the sea, <S%H3220><s%> Whose wall <S%H2346><s%> [consisted] of the sea <S%H3220><s%>?

Ethiopia <S%H3568><s%> was [her] might, <S%H6109><s%> And Egypt <S%H4714><s%> too, without <S%H369><s%> limits. <S%H9523><s%> Put <S%H6316><s%> and Lubim <S%H3864><s%> were among her helpers. <S%H5833><s%>

Yet <S%H1571><s%> she became an exile, <S%H1473><s%> She went <S%H1980><s%> into captivity; <S%H7628><s%> Also <S%H1571><s%> her small children <S%H5768><s%> were dashed <S%H7376><s%> to pieces <S%H7376><s%> At the head <S%H7218><s%> of every <S%H3605><s%> street; <S%H2351><s%> They cast <S%H3032><s%> lots <S%H1486><s%> for her honorable <S%H3513><s%> men, And all <S%H3605><s%> her great <S%H1419><s%> men <S%H1419><s%> were bound <S%H7576><s%> with fetters. <S%H9108><s%>

You too <S%H1571><s%> will become <S%H7937><s%> drunk, <S%H7937><s%> You will be hidden. <S%H5956><s%> You too <S%H1571><s%> will search <S%H1245><s%> for a refuge <S%H4581><s%> from the enemy. <S%H340><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> your fortifications <S%H4013><s%> are fig <S%H8384><s%> trees <S%H8384><s%> with ripe <S%H1061><s%> fruit <S%H1061><s%> – When <S%H518><s%> shaken, <S%H5128><s%> they fall <S%H5307><s%> into the eater's mouth. <S%H6310><s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> your people <S%H5971><s%> are women <S%H802><s%> in your midst! <S%H7130><s%> The gates <S%H8179><s%> of your land <S%H776><s%> are opened <S%H6605><s%> wide <S%H6605><s%> to your enemies; <S%H340><s%> Fire <S%H784><s%> consumes <S%H398><s%> your gate bars. <S%H1280><s%>

Draw <S%H7579><s%> for yourself water <S%H4325><s%> for the siege! <S%H4692><s%> Strengthen <S%H2388><s%> your fortifications! <S%H4013><s%> Go <S%H935><s%> into the clay <S%H2916><s%> and tread <S%H7429><s%> the mortar! <S%H2563><s%> Take <S%H2388><s%> hold <S%H2388><s%> of the brick <S%H4404><s%> mold! <S%H4404><s%>

There <S%H8033><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> will consume <S%H398><s%> you, The sword <S%H2719><s%> will cut <S%H3772><s%> you down; <S%H3772><s%> It will consume <S%H398><s%> you as the locust <S%H3218><s%> [does.] Multiply <S%H3513><s%> yourself like the creeping <S%H3218><s%> locust, <S%H3218><s%> Multiply <S%H3513><s%> yourself like the swarming <S%H697><s%> locust. <S%H697><s%>

You have increased <S%H7235><s%> your traders <S%H7402><s%> more <S%H4480><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> the stars <S%H3556><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%> – The creeping <S%H3218><s%> locust <S%H3218><s%> strips <S%H6584><s%> and flies <S%H5774><s%> away. <S%H5774><s%>

Your guardsmen <S%H4502><s%> are like the swarming <S%H697><s%> locust. <S%H697><s%> Your marshals <S%H2951><s%> are like hordes <S%H1462><s%> of grasshoppers <S%H1462><s%> Settling <S%H2583><s%> in the stone walls <S%H1448><s%> on a cold <S%H7135><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%> The sun <S%H8121><s%> rises <S%H2224><s%> and they flee, <S%H5074><s%> And the place <S%H4725><s%> where <S%H335><s%> they are is not known. <S%H3045><s%>

Your shepherds <S%H7462><s%> are sleeping, <S%H5123><s%> O king <S%H4428><s%> of Assyria; <S%H804><s%> Your nobles <S%H117><s%> are lying <S%H7931><s%> down. <S%H7931><s%> Your people <S%H5971><s%> are scattered <S%H9448><s%> on the mountains, <S%H2022><s%> And there <S%H369><s%> is no <S%H369><s%> one <S%H369><s%> to regather <S%H6908><s%> [them.]

There <S%H369><s%> is no <S%H369><s%> relief <S%H3545><s%> for your breakdown, <S%H7667><s%> Your wound <S%H4347><s%> is incurable. <S%H2470><s%> All <S%H3605><s%> who hear <S%H8085><s%> about <S%H8088><s%> you Will clap <S%H8628><s%> [their] hands <S%H3709><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> you, For on whom <S%H4310><s%> has not your evil <S%H9567><s%> passed <S%H5674><s%> continually <S%H8548><s%>?
